query:
INSERT INTO score (
                channel_id,
                chatter_id,
                score,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            )
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3, NOW(), NOW())
            ON CONFLICT (channel_id, chatter_id)
            DO UPDATE SET
                score = score.score + $3,
                updated_at = NOW()
            RETURNING 
                channel_id,
                chatter_id,
                score
